column5: Wayne, the funny part is I was watching the Chartplotter and was heading right towards the blue 'patch'    I'm such an idiot..  We had a guy over today and he said a little welding will do it..   I guess we got lucky..  No more launching from Pier 69 for us, Penetang it is from now on...  to many wrong word rocks!
My dad used to be a partner in a lodge located on Kenogaming Lake.   Talk about pike/pickerel   I'd like to get back up there this year.

Slackard!!!  I think you could get more fishin' in than that if you really wanted to!   Ol' Yeller informed me she would like to go fishin' this weekend, so I'll be takin' her out for Crappie and maybe a little Striper trolling with the Bimini top up. She turns into a tomatoe in the sun doncha know.
I might try for some steelhead with my new equipment.
Don't forget the marshmallows and landing net!!!

Sorry to dissappoint GCD! I had to scratch the perch off the list for friday. I gotta get some sleep sometime. I'm planning on having my line in the water at 12:00:01 saturday morning......fishing from my dads cruiser. We'll be double anchored, with lights a blazing, and beer a chillin, until we can't stay awake any longer. Then crash for a few hours on board. Once we wake up, we'll be heading back to the marina, where I'll have my 16ft TILLER fishing machine.....then the "real" fishing starts.  Mothers day sunday.....but my mom loves whities......  Have fun with ole yeller. She'll prolly out fish ya  Sinker
Well im doing the kawarthas & haliburton for walleyes,   man im pumped and ready to go !!!!!  cheers & good luck to all & be safe,no booze in the boat please !!!!
Prob go to scugog or somewhere in port perry.
I'm off to Barrie for the weekend for a family thing BUT I'm bringing my stuff just in case my bro-in-law and I can sneek away for a bit...  Anywhere good near Phelpston (not sure of the spelling)?
yes
ok, that's a good start...  LOL rivers or???
Job Security!! Very nice!
Trying for trout in New York
Whatcha fishing for there?  I'd double check the regs...
leavin to the DOMINICAN REPUBLIC on Sunday. WOOT WOOT.  Gonna go deep sea fishing one day for sure.  Full report when I get back.  reefrunner
RICE RICE and more RICE
I second this for Sunday.
Check your PM Raf.  I'm on dial-up here so pc time is over after this for the weekend.  Oh the pain of dial-up...

Hopefully some walleye and crappie on Stony lake with my dad. Probably staying over Saturday night at the trailer and also fishing somewhere Sunday. I have been off all week fishing with my wife for Simcoe perch and Kawartha crappies since last Saturday with the exception of Wednesday. It was a very good week with lots of good fish everyday! I still haven't had enough.

Well picking up my boat at the dealer had a few bugs on the new boat to iron out like lockable rod storage did not lock.  My trolling plate is now history because it cracked one of the fins it was bolted to Happy troller never again.  I am going back to using a kicker so I will try it out Sunday at the same time I will bring my boy fishin for some Pike.  AH I LOVE FISHIN
Don't worry i wont!
Next week-end I am hoping to finally get out somwhere.  It's about dang time too.

Well, Gbay might have claimed another lower unit today, but we might get lucky skag is COMPLETELY gone, but shaft spins true and it's not leaking any oil....  I gotta stop watching the toys and start watching the water  %^!)*$$!!!  No fish to make it even worse, ah well.
I hope to get out but where i have no clue where to go. I guess I'll head up to Rice and do a little bit of fishing with my pops
Did yah want a chart Bill ! LOL  Sorry about your luck. I think I told you how many lower units my f-in-law went thru on our Searay's Merc cruiser!

I think myself and the oldman are going to head out of Severn into the Bay on Sat to chase some pike and pickerel.  Hopefully we tie into something!  I think I'll be making the maiden cast with my muskie setup also.  Mind as well test it out on some pike before I start launching $20 muskie lures   Perhaps I'll be making an entry or two for Team 5!!!   Anyone else have plans for the weekend?
STONEY LAKE for me! Gonna (hopefully) get into some Walleye and crappie!  Cant wait!!! Been waiting MONTHS to finally get back in the boat!
I wil be fishing Kings Fri Sat Sunday ...after my charters i will be on the Grand for the eve fishing Walleye ..
Sounds good!!!   One thing I really miss about living in St.Catharines is the access I had to great salmon fishing.  I haven't been out on Lake O fishing for kings in years....  Good luck!
Right now is prime time for Kings ..
Off to Upper Buckhorn tomorrow for crappie and walleye on Saturday am. I'm also going to be scouting for muskie territory.
Something within biking range lol. Prolly try to get into some pike

Camping at Fosters Fishing on the Bay of Quinte friday and saturday.  My buddy and I are taking the girls (who like to fish) out for some walleye action.  Hopefully the cold start to the season has kept the big boy's out of the bay for a week.  Based on the tournament results posted from last weeks opener, I didn't see as many huge Eyes as I would have expected.   fingers crossed!

Heading up to Muskoka....so no pike or walleye yet.  will make sure the motor is good to go for next weekend though, and hopefully, HOPEfully, hit a certain little back lake for a repeat performance on some ice-out lakers.
I'm hoping for the Hammer Trifecta of catfish, carp & pike.  Or petition for sheepshead to be eligible for the tourney
I'm going to Ottawa.. to a darn wedding! ' Only bonus...Crazyhook has some nice big flies for me to pick up while I'm there !!
Guys weekend at my buddies cottage... with his own private lake....rainbows and speckies & a little turkey hunting.  Ya, it's rough, but somebody has to do it.
Gonna check some some Lake O harbours for some Pike on Saturday with Bly.  If the weather holds up then it's off to Lake Scugog for some panfish with the kids!
Grey country troutskies for me!!
Crappies this evening, perch tomorrow, Kawartha pickeral saturday, simcoe whities sunday.  I'm getting tired just thinking about it.....poor me  Sinker
I just picked up some Uptown Bulldawgs from JB's along with some flouro leaders and a few jerkbait leaders.....   Talk about a tackle shop, that place is heaven!!! (Although a little cluttered  )
Taking the kayak out for some conservation area pike.
sturgeon lake for me leaveing tomorow morning i would like to hit stoney lake always do very good there   :clapping:  :clapping:
Gogama area
Two words for you:  MOTHER's DAY.
mothers day   get this....I'm skipping out on the weekend of our 22nd wedding anniversary.  That's why I always buy my wife jewelery several times a year for no particular reason.
Pike Tournament on Lake Couchiching on Saturday. $50 per team, all are welcome. PM me for details
Saturday hope to go out with a fellow member here.  Sunday Morning going fishing with the Girlfriend, Boss and his son. On the Credit River.
Pre-fishing Belwood Lake before the CTTS tournament next weekend!
Goderich and bayfield for some rainbows and maybe some walleye out at the pier if i am lucky
